div.p: Group 1 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Timing|5.0.0 to unspecified code system

tr.td: FHIR R5 ComplexType `Timing` is representable via FHIR R4 extensions. Element `Timing` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Timing`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Timing.event` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Timing.event`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Timing.repeat` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Timing.repeat`, but has no comparisons.

Element `Timing.repeat.bounds[x]` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Timing.repeat` requires a cross-version extension. Note that the target element context `Timing.repeat.bounds[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Timing.repeat`. Element `Timing.repeat.bounds[x]` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Timing.repeat.bounds[x]`, but has no comparisons. Note that the target element context `Timing.repeat.bounds[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Timing.repeat`.

Element `Timing.repeat.count` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Timing.repeat` requires a cross-version extension. Element `Timing.repeat.count` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Timing.repeat.count`, but has no comparisons.

Element `Timing.repeat.countMax` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Timing.repeat` requires a cross-version extension. Element `Timing.repeat.countMax` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Timing.repeat.countMax`, but has no comparisons.

Element `Timing.repeat.duration` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Timing.repeat` requires a cross-version extension. Element `Timing.repeat.duration` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Timing.repeat.duration`, but has no comparisons.

Element `Timing.repeat.durationMax` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Timing.repeat` requires a cross-version extension. Element `Timing.repeat.durationMax` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Timing.repeat.durationMax`, but has no comparisons.

Element `Timing.repeat.durationUnit` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Timing.repeat` requires a cross-version extension. Element `Timing.repeat.durationUnit` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Timing.repeat.durationUnit`, but has no comparisons.

Element `Timing.repeat.frequency` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Timing.repeat` requires a cross-version extension. Element `Timing.repeat.frequency` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Timing.repeat.frequency`, but has no comparisons.

Element `Timing.repeat.frequencyMax` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Timing.repeat` requires a cross-version extension. Element `Timing.repeat.frequencyMax` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Timing.repeat.frequencyMax`, but has no comparisons.

Element `Timing.repeat.period` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Timing.repeat` requires a cross-version extension. Element `Timing.repeat.period` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Timing.repeat.period`, but has no comparisons.

Element `Timing.repeat.periodMax` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Timing.repeat` requires a cross-version extension. Element `Timing.repeat.periodMax` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Timing.repeat.periodMax`, but has no comparisons.

Element `Timing.repeat.periodUnit` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Timing.repeat` requires a cross-version extension. Element `Timing.repeat.periodUnit` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Timing.repeat.periodUnit`, but has no comparisons.

Element `Timing.repeat.dayOfWeek` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Timing.repeat` requires a cross-version extension. Element `Timing.repeat.dayOfWeek` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Timing.repeat.dayOfWeek`, but has no comparisons.

Element `Timing.repeat.timeOfDay` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Timing.repeat` requires a cross-version extension. Element `Timing.repeat.timeOfDay` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Timing.repeat.timeOfDay`, but has no comparisons.

Element `Timing.repeat.when` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Timing.repeat` requires a cross-version extension. Element `Timing.repeat.when` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Timing.repeat.when`, but has no comparisons.

Element `Timing.repeat.offset` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Timing.repeat` requires a cross-version extension. Element `Timing.repeat.offset` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Timing.repeat.offset`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Timing.code` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Timing.code`, but has no comparisons.

title.value: Cross-version ConceptMap for FHIR R5 resources in FHIR R4

description.value: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of resource FHIR R5 for use in FHIR R4.
